<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Wandering Preacher](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=278)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 123</row>

</column>

While you once spoke to a small congregation in a ramshackle church, those days are behind you now. Your church was destroyed, your congregants scattered, and now you meander the lands holding a worn copy of your religious text in one hand, and a fiery conviction in the other.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) skill, and a [Lore](/skills/lore) skill associated with the deity you preach for (such as [Pharasmin](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) Lore). You gain the [Pilgrim's Token](/Feats.aspx?ID=2141) skill feat.
name: Wandering Preacher
